Text: Why Larry Ellison is tearing his hair outPST Dear Investor Thanks to Siggy this tech Blue Chip ROSE in And its taking new territory so aggressively that Oracles Larry Ellison is tearing his hair out GAINS Thats an amazing number when you consider two points This isnt some smallfry bucking the trend because of some lucky break Its one of the BIG BOYS of technology having a good year when virtually every other big boy from Cisco to Oracle to Intel has suffered badly CAN YOU IMAGINE how well this stock will do when the economy and sentiment turns Siggy is HOT And its going to make us a ton of money in the months and years aheadsay in months and a small fortune after that But what is this Siggy thing you might ask Its a transistor SiGe nicknamed Siggy more than times faster than Intels screaming Pentium made by the same company that first discovered that silicon germanium could soup up chip performance This technology is newintroduced for the first time in But its taking the entire industry by storm Worldwide sales were a few million dollars in but projections make this at least a billion product in less than years Heres the short story First you plop a atom thick layer of silicon germanium on an old gardenvariety silicon chip Then you redesign the vertical bipolar transistor for increased efficiency And bingo youre the proud parent of the worlds fastest silicon transistor HOW FAST IS IT It turns on and off over billion times a second Running Siggy against a Pentium is like running a Ducati R superbike against a Vespa scooter What does this speed mean Heres one example Soupedup silicon chips delivering mega amounts of data to homes is a wireless dream about to come true Theres no need to run expensive cables The LASTMILE barrier to broadband is hurdled without wires But theres a LOT MORE to Siggys story than just that Nothingand I mean nothingup to now has come close to Siggys performance and versatility As Ive already said its blazing fasta critical factor in highspeed communications Yet it draws incredibly little power at the same timea boon that is finally making the next generation of wireless technologies possible Whats more this chip creates exceptionally little background noise making it ideal for applications that depend on high sensitivity So how is this technology being usedand whos using it Siggys MOST IMPORTANT application is in all facets of highspeed communications If you knew what you were looking for youd find this chip in Internet appliances cell phones storage modules base stations broadband networks wireless onsite networks and more Virtually everywhere that HIGH SPEED communications makes its mark Both analog and digital as well Time Domain Corp globally in Ultra Wideband wireless technology uses Siggy to power its performance and profits Companies like Vitesse and Sierra Monolithics find Siggy a crucial component in the highend equipment that makes fiber optic communications possible Alcatel is big on Siggy for being key to affordable highperformance networks The list goes on and on It seems that barely a day goes by that Siggys corporate parent doesnt announce new accoladesand big new contractsfor its offspring THATS PRETTY NEAT when you consider this companys background As I mentioned earlier its huge and incredibly profitable In fact right now this firm has Larry Ellison tearing his hair out as it overtakes Oracle on its own database turf But up until a few years ago this company didnt even make chips for outside consumption Of course when youve got hot technologiesand Siggy is just one of manywhy not take advantage Today this firm does about billion in annual chip salesand were not talking those runofthemill chips that everyone from California to Taiwan knows how to make This outfit specializes in custombuilt highend models like Siggy where they have a technological edgeand FAT profit margins WANT TO LEARN MORE Want the name of Siggys parent
